modmenu.descriptionTranslation.kzeaddon: Improve game experience on the KZE server!
desc.kzeaddon.option.overrideZombieTeamC: Override the Zombie team color when enabled
desc.kzeaddon.option.zombieTeamColor: Use by override zombie team color when it's enabled
desc.kzeaddon.option.overrideGunfireVolu: Override the gunfire volume when enabled
desc.kzeaddon.option.gunfireVolume: Use by override gunfire volume as value when it's enabled
desc.kzeaddon.option.playNotificationSou: Play notification sound when start vote
desc.kzeaddon.option.showFriendlyInvisib: Can see friendly invisibles as half-translucent when enable
desc.kzeaddon.option.hideFriendlyInvisib: Hide equipped items of friendly invisibles
desc.kzeaddon.option.overrideShowFriendl: Overrides the seeFriendlyInvisibles of the team at enable
